SongName: When You Say Nothing At All
Lyric:
[00:12.020]It's amazing how you can speak right to my heart
[00:22.900]Without saying a word you can light up the dark
[00:33.400]Try as I may I can never explain
[00:39.340]What I hear when you don't say a thing
[00:48.400]The smile on your face lets me know that you need me
[00:53.970]There's a truth in your eyes saying you'll never leave me
[00:59.400]The touch of your hand says you'll catch me wherever I fall
[01:10.780]You say it best' when you say nothing at all
[01:27.770]All day long I can hear people talking out loud
[01:38.710]But when you hold me near' you drown out the crowd
[01:49.340]Try as they may they can never define
[01:55.210]What's been said between your heart and mine
[02:01.530]The smile on your face lets me know that you need me
[02:06.780]There's a truth in your eyes saying you'll never leave me
[02:12.470]The touch of your hand says you'll catch me wherever I fall
[02:23.900]You say it best' when you say nothing at all
[02:52.030]The smile on your face lets me know that you need me
[02:56.590]There's a truth in your eyes saying you'll never leave me
[03:05.030]The touch of your hand says you'll catch me wherever I fall
[03:16.350]You say it best' when you say nothing at all
[03:33.350]（You say it best when you say nothing at all）
[03:38.540]（You say it best when you say nothing at all）
[03:43.670]The smile on your face（You say it best...）
[03:46.470]The truth in your eyes（when you say nothing at all.）
[03:49.700]The touch of your hand（You say it best...）
[03:51.410]Lets me know that you need me（when you say nothing at all.）
[03:55.230]（You say it best when you say nothing at all）
[04:00.540]（You say it best when you say nothing at all）
